definitions.definition: To concentrate toward the essence by making more close, compact, or dense, thereby decreasing size or volume.
definitions.example: An abridged dictionary can be further condensed to pocket size.

definitions.definition: To transform from a gaseous state into a liquid state via condensation.
To be transformed from a gaseous state into a liquid state.
definitions.example: Water condenses on the window on cold days because of the warm air inside.
